DOC.brief_summary: This two part study compare CHS-0214 Enbrel patient chronic plaque PsO yet receive biologic therapy indication ( insulin hormone ) .
DOC.brief_title: Comparison CHS-0214 Enbrel ( Etanercept ) Patients With Chronic Plaque Psoriasis ( PsO )
DOC.detailed_description: Pt . 1 12-week randomize , double-blind , active-control , parallel-group , multi-center global study . The primary end point 75 % improvement baseline accord Psoriasis Area Severity Index ( PASI-75 ) . Comparing CHS-0214 Enbrel efficacy safety dosage 50mg subcutaneous ( Sc ) twice weekly . Pt . 2 40-week randomize , double-blind , active-control , parallel-group , multi-center global study CHS-0214 Enbrel dosage reduce 50mg Sc weekly maintenance .
DOC.criteria: Male female adult PsO diagnosis 6 month Active disease : PASI great equal 12 , Physician 's Static Global Assessment ( PSGA ) score great equal 3 ( base scale 05 ) , Body Surface Area ( BSA ) involve PsO great equal 10 % Dermatology Life Quality Index ( DQLI ) great equal 10 Previously receive phototherapy systemic nonbiologic therapy PsO Forms Psoriasis PsO Drug induce Psoriasis Positive QuantiFERONtuberculosis ( TB ) Gold Test Presence significant comorbid condition Chemistry hematology value outside protocol specify range Major systemic infection
